Articles.Content:
This station is capable of mun ladings and also perform orbital ops pics and link will be updated and added soon just working out some kinks the station in orbit or on mun weighs 77.1tons in a 3 man pod.

here is a pic of it around minmus you can see kerbin and the mun in the background.
